steps.name: Go to 'Men's Jeans' section and close adverts modal, if appears
click on 'Jeans' inside 'Men's' section with waiting for presence ofd element
check if there is a modal layer with shadow root and close it
on 'Men's Jeans' page scroll to second item, click on it, wait for url and close adverts modal, if appears
get text of second item from 'Men's Jeans' page
scroll to second item, move cursor to it and click
check if there is a modal layer with shadow root and close it
move to size and click, then scroll to first and click
scroll to first size option inside dropdown and pick it
click on 'Add to Bag' button
